studentmodule.name: id
studentmodule.description: A numerical index of the module (primary key in edX's databases)

studentmodule.name: module_type
studentmodule.description: The type of the module touched by the learner

studentmodule.name: module_id
studentmodule.description: The ID of the module touched by the learner

studentmodule.name: student_id
studentmodule.description: The user ID of the learner

studentmodule.name: state
studentmodule.description: The state of the module encoded as a JSON string

studentmodule.name: grade
studentmodule.description: The current grade the learner has earned in the module

studentmodule.name: created
studentmodule.description: The timestamp at which the state was created

studentmodule.name: modified
studentmodule.description: A timestamp at which the state was modified

studentmodule.name: max_grade
studentmodule.description: The max grade that can be obtained in this module

studentmodule.name: done
studentmodule.description: A string indicating whether the learner is done with the module

studentmodule.name: course_id
studentmodule.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

description: Table generated with the file courseware_studentmodule-analytics.sql from the SQL bundle by the simeon CLI tool. It tracks the module states for each learner
